dcterms:description: A dataset containing labeled cyberbullying incidents on the Instagram social network, collected by analyzing the presence of toxic words to maximize the chances of collecting positive samples, which were subsequently manually annotated.
dcterms:title: Instagram Dataset

dcterms:creator: Rahat Ibn Rafiq
Homa Hosseinmardi
Richard Han
Qin Lv
Shivakant Mishra
Sabrina Arredondo Mattson
dcterms:description: A dataset for detecting cyberbullying instances in Vine, collected similarly to the Instagram dataset by analyzing the presence of toxic words to maximize the chances of collecting positive samples, which were subsequently manually annotated.
dcterms:title: Vine Dataset
